summary.para: Called to install a mouse event sink.

param.name: range
param.para: Pointer to an interface that specifies the range of text that the mouse sink is installed for.

param.name: pSink
param.para: Pointer to the interface. The application must increment this object reference count and save the interface.

param.name: pdwCookie
param.para: Pointer to a DWORD that receives a cookie that identifies the mouse event sink.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: One or more parameters are invalid.
The application does not support mouse event sinks.

remarks.para: When this advise sink is installed, a mouse event that occurs over the range specified by range will result in the mouse event sink method being called.
The value placed in pdwCookie will be saved by the caller and passed to the method to remove the mouse event sink.

summary.para: Called to remove a mouse event sink.

param.name: dwCookie
param.para: Specifies the mouse advise sink identifier. This value is obtained by a call to .

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: The application does not support mouse event sinks.

remarks.para: The application must release the supplied in the ITfMouseTrackerACP.AdviseMouseSink call associated with dwCookie.

summary.para: The ITfMouseTrackerACP interface is implemented by an application to support mouse event sinks. This interface is used by the TSF manager to add and remove mouse event sinks in an ACP-based application. The TSF manager obtains this interface by calling the application's ITextStoreACP.QueryInterface with IID_ITfMouseTrackerACP.
